title: How Do You Use Another Profile?
body: I haven't played LoL in well over a year, maybe two, and I thought I'd play again. I had to install it using Garena, and after it installed I'm just given a big red play button which loads the client with a new profile. I have an old profile with heaps of characters which I would like to log in with, but I can't find anywhere that I can log out of this new profile and enter my old login details. Where can I enter my old login details to access my old profile?

replies.body: press logout it  should be there when you get in client
